title: Gelatinous Cube
description: 10’ cubes of transparent jelly. Move through dungeons, absorbing debris and living creatures they come across.
extras: Surprise: On a roll of 1–4, due to near-invisibility.	Paralysis: For 2d4 turns (save versus paralysis).	Energy immunity: Unharmed by cold or lightning.	Embedded items: Indigestible items (e.g. gems, coins) are carried around inside the cube.
